## DefaultEventTypes variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DefaultEventTypes: {
    readonly EXCEPTION: "EXCEPTION";
    readonly ERROR: "ERROR";
    readonly WARNING: "WARNING";
    readonly INFO: "INFO";
    readonly DEBUG: "DEBUG";
    readonly SUCCESS: "SUCCESS";
}
```
